97.text: the Max Planck Institute for Meteorology in Hamburg

193.text: Sandrine Bony , a climate researcher at the Laboratory of Dynamic Meteorology in Paris

8.text: prominent climatologists who are trying to spark enthusiasm for their field in budding researchers who might otherwise choose astrophysics or cosmology

212.text: Paul Linden , a fluid - dynamics researcher at the University of Cambridge , UK

90.text: Piers Forster , a climate modeller at the University of Leeds , UK

quotes.text: "In fact, essential physical aspects of climate change are poorly understood."
quotes.speaker: Sandrine Bony

quotes.text: "We too quickly turn to the policy implications of our work and forget the basic science,"
quotes.speaker: Bjorn Stevens

quotes.text: "Very few, and rarely the best, choose to do a master thesis in climatology,"
quotes.speaker: Thierry Fichefet

quotes.text: "Talented physicists commonly go into more glamorous fields such as astronomy, cosmology or particle physics."
quotes.speaker: Thierry Fichefet

quotes.text: "We offer courses in climate science and our students do recognize the importance of the field,"
quotes.speaker: Paul Linden

quotes.text: "Most physics students would rather study with someone like Stephen Hawking, who is a member of our faculty."
quotes.speaker: his
